ageVerification.title: Age Verification
ageVerification.description: This content is intended for adults 18 years or older. Please confirm that you are 18 or older.

contentVisibility.title: This content is hidden by your settings
contentVisibility.description: This content is set to hidden. Do you want to view it?
contentVisibility.hint: To always show rated content, please adjust your content settings

auth.loginOnlyCta: New user registration is disabled on this instance.
auth.logoutConfirm: Are you sure you want to logout?
auth.emailUnverified: Email is not verified. Please check your verification email.
auth.verificationResent: Verification email sent. Please check your inbox.
auth.usernameMinLength: Username must be at least 3 characters
auth.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters
auth.verificationSent: A verification email has been sent to your email address.
auth.verificationInstruction: Click the link in the email to activate your account.
auth.emailVerifiedDesc: Your email has been verified. You can now log in.
auth.tokenExpired: Token is invalid or expired. Please resend the verification email.
auth.passwordResetDesc: Enter your registered email address. We'll send you a password reset link.
auth.passwordResetEmailSent: We've sent a password reset link to your email. Please check your inbox.
auth.passwordResetCompleteDesc: Your password has been reset. Please log in with your new password.
auth.passwordValidationError: Passwords do not match or are less than 8 characters.
auth.resetTokenExpired: Token is invalid or expired. Please try resetting again.
auth.twoFactorDesc: Enter the 6-digit code from your authenticator app or an 8-digit backup code
auth.backupCodeUsed: Backup code used. We recommend generating new backup codes in settings.
auth.backupCodeHelp:
Enter your 8-digit backup code.

Backup codes were provided when you set up 2FA. If you don't have access to your backup codes, please contact the administrator.
auth.userIdNotFound: User ID not found. Please log in again.
auth.invalidCodeFormat: Please enter a 6-digit TOTP code or 8-digit backup code.
auth.invalidAuthCode: Invalid authentication code. Please try again.

bluesky.unlinkConfirm: Are you sure you want to unlink?
bluesky.unlinkConfirmMessage: Unlinking your Bluesky account will disable Bluesky login.
bluesky.quickRegisterHint: Quick registration with your Bluesky account (no password required)
bluesky.chooseUsername: Choose a username for this instance
bluesky.invalidToken: Registration token is invalid or expired

pendingApproval.title: Pending Approval
pendingApproval.message: Your account has been created and is pending approval by an administrator. Please wait for approval.
pendingApproval.blueskyHint: Your Bluesky account link has been saved.

auth.usernameTooShort: Username must be at least 3 characters
auth.usernameTooLong: Username must be 30 characters or less
auth.usernameMustStartWithLetter: Username must start with a letter
auth.usernameInvalidChars: Username can only contain lowercase letters, numbers, and underscores
auth.tosRequired: You must agree to the Terms of Service

artwork.deleteConfirm: Delete this artwork? This action cannot be undone.
artwork.imageReorderHint: Drag to reorder, click X to delete
artwork.minImageRequired: At least one image is required
artwork.addImages: Click or drop to add images
artwork.noEditPermission: You don't have permission to edit this artwork
artwork.notFoundDescription: The artwork you're looking for doesn't exist or may have been deleted.
artwork.privateDescription: This artwork is only visible to its author.
artwork.followersOnlyDescription: This artwork is only visible to users who follow the author.
artwork.downloadSectionHint: Download the original images you uploaded.

user.userNotFoundDesc: The user you're looking for doesn't exist or has been deleted.
user.findAndCreateCollection: Find works and create a collection

settings.title: Settings
settings.ageVerificationHint: You must set your birthday and be 18+ to view R-18 content
settings.contentFiltersHint: Choose how to display artworks for each rating level

tools.title: Tools Used
tools.description: Register the tools you use for creating artwork. This makes it easy to select them when uploading.
tools.useAsDefaultDesc: Automatically select your registered tools when creating a new artwork

twoFactor.title: Two-Factor Authentication
twoFactor.setupDescription: Scan this QR code with an authenticator app like Google Authenticator or Authy.
twoFactor.manualEntry: If you can't scan the QR code, enter this code manually:
twoFactor.verificationCodeHint: Enter the 6-digit code from your authenticator app
twoFactor.backupCodesDescription: Use these if you lose access to your authenticator app. Store them safely.
twoFactor.backupCodesImportant: Backup codes can be used to login if you lose access to your authenticator app. Each code can only be used once. Store them in a safe place.
twoFactor.regenerateWarning: Regenerating will invalidate all existing backup codes
twoFactor.disableWarning: Disabling two-factor authentication will make your account less secure. Are you sure?
twoFactor.confirmRegenerate:
Regenerate backup codes?
All existing codes will be invalidated.

upload.title: Upload Artwork
upload.dropzone: Drop images here or click to select
upload.caption: Caption
upload.nsfwTooltip: Content containing suggestive or sexy expressions. Choose this if there is no nudity or explicit sexual content
upload.visibilityPublicTooltip: Anyone can view this and it will be shared across the Fediverse. Shown in public timeline
upload.visibilityUnlistedTooltip: Anyone with the URL can view this, but it won't appear in public timeline or search results
upload.visibilityFollowersTooltip: Only users who follow you can view this
upload.visibilityPrivateTooltip: Only you can view this. Not visible to other users
upload.sizeHint: Max 32MB per file, up to 20 files (200MB total)
upload.unsupportedFormat: {name} is not a supported format (JPEG/PNG/WEBP/GIF/SVG only)
upload.disableRightClickTooltip: Disables right-click menu on images to discourage saving. This is not a complete prevention
upload.uploadingHint: Encrypting and saving images. Please wait.
upload.licenseHint: Select the license for this artwork. This will be embedded in the image metadata.
upload.licenseFanArt: Fan Art - Derivative Work (Original rights belong to original creator)
upload.creationDateHint: The date the artwork was actually created
upload.mediumHint: The medium used to create this artwork
upload.toolsUsedHint: Tools used to create this artwork
upload.isCommissionHint: Whether this artwork was created as a commission
upload.clientNameHint: Only include if you have client permission
upload.externalUrlHint: Link to this artwork on other sites
upload.toolsProfileHint: Register frequently used tools in your profile settings for convenience.
upload.copyrightTypeHint: Relationship between the uploader and rights holder
upload.copyrightHolderPlaceholder: Name of rights holder (if different from uploader)
upload.copyrightHolderHint: For commissions, enter the client's name
upload.originalCreatorHint: For fan art, you can link the original creator's user account
upload.originalCreatorAllowDownloadHint: Allows the original creator to download the original images of this work
upload.fanArtCharacterHint: Select a fan art welcome character. The character creator will be notified.

search.title: Search Results
search.remoteTypeNotImplemented: This type of remote content is not yet implemented: {type}
search.remoteContentError: An error occurred while fetching remote content

error.backendUnavailableDesc: The backend server is unavailable. Please try again later.
error.checkBackendRunning: Please check if the backend server is running
error.step3Title: Refresh this page once the server is running
error.step3Desc: It may take a few seconds for the backend to start
error.stillCannotConnect: Still cannot connect to the server. Please check if it's running.
error.notFoundDesc: The page you're looking for doesn't exist or may have been moved.
error.serverErrorDesc: Something went wrong on our end. Please try again later.
error.forbiddenDesc: You don't have permission to access this page.
error.unknownErrorDesc: Something went wrong. Please refresh the page or try again later.

admin.federationModeNotice: This instance is running in federation mode. Mode cannot be changed.
admin.allowRegistrationDesc: Whether to accept new user registrations
admin.requireApprovalDesc: When enabled, new users require administrator approval
admin.allowSearchEngineIndexingDesc: When enabled, Google, Bing, and other search engines can index your content. AI training bots are always blocked. SNS/ActivityPub previews are prioritized.
admin.modeChangeWarning2: Switching to federation mode enables multiple user registrations
admin.modeChangeWarning3: Federation with other illo instances will be enabled
admin.modeChangeWarning4: You cannot switch back to PERSONAL mode after this change
admin.modeChangeConfirmMessage:
Are you sure you want to switch to federation mode (FEDERATION_ONLY)?
This action cannot be undone.
admin.modePersonalDesc: A personal portfolio mode where only the administrator can post. Other users cannot register.
admin.modeFederationDesc: A mode where multiple users can register and federate with other illo instances.
admin.modeFullFediverseDesc: A mode that enables federation with all ActivityPub-compatible instances like Mastodon and Pixelfed. (Not implemented)
admin.modeChangeSuccessReloading: Switched to federation mode. Reloading instance info...
admin.modeChangeComplete: Successfully switched to federation mode. New user registrations are now enabled.
admin.searchPlaceholder: Search by username, display name, or email...
admin.approveUserConfirm: Are you sure you want to approve {'@'}{username}? The user will be able to log in and use the platform.
admin.rejectUserConfirm: Are you sure you want to reject {'@'}{username}? Per ActivityPub specification, this account's ID will be permanently reserved (Tombstoned). The username can be used by another user, but the Actor ID will not be reused.
admin.suspendUserConfirm: Are you sure you want to suspend {'@'}{username}? The user will be immediately logged out and will not be able to access their account.
admin.activateUserConfirm: Are you sure you want to activate {'@'}{username}? The user will be able to access their account again.

rateLimit.title: Rate Limit Settings

config.title: Rate Limit Configuration
config.enabledDesc: Detect manual scraping based on viewing frequency and degrade image quality
config.softLimitPerWindowDesc: Number of artwork views to trigger soft limit
config.hardLimitPerWindowDesc: Number of artwork views to trigger hard limit
config.softLimitPerHourDesc: Number of artwork views per hour to trigger soft limit
config.hardLimitPerHourDesc: Number of artwork views per hour to trigger hard limit
config.maxPenaltyMinutesDesc: Maximum penalty duration for repeat offenders

rateLimit.headlessDetectionDesc: Apply stricter thresholds for access without real user interaction
rateLimit.noInteractionEnabledDesc: Detect access without mouse or keyboard interaction
rateLimit.noInteractionThresholdMultiplierDesc: Multiplier for thresholds when no interaction detected (0.5 = thresholds halved, stricter)

imageCache.title: Image Cache
imageCache.enabledDesc: Cache images from remote instances locally
imageCache.autoCacheDesc: Automatically cache images from new remote artworks
imageCache.ttlDaysDesc: How long to keep cached images
imageCache.priorityThresholdDesc: Artworks above this score are exempt from deletion (score = likes × 10 + views)

tosSettings.title: Terms of Service Settings
tosSettings.fileBasedInfo: Terms of Service and Privacy Policy are managed via source files:
tosSettings.incrementVersionDesc: After updating source files, increment the version to require existing users to re-accept
tosSettings.saveFailed: Failed to save Terms of Service settings

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.characterFanArtAction: posted fan art of your character "{name}"

encryption.encryptedHint: This message is encrypted and stored securely.
encryption.notEncryptedWarning: This message will not be encrypted.
encryption.unsupportedInstanceWarning: The recipient's instance ({domain}) does not support encrypted messages. This message will be sent in plain text.
encryption.notSupportedDescription: The recipient's instance ({domains}) does not support end-to-end encryption. Messages will be sent in plain text.
encryption.statusAllLocal: All users are local. Messages are encrypted at rest.
encryption.statusPartial: Only some participants support end-to-end encryption.
encryption.statusNone: The recipient's instance does not support end-to-end encryption.

home.noWorksYet: No works have been posted yet
home.noFollowingYet: No works from followed users yet

security.securityEnhanced: Your account security has been enhanced
security.twoFactorDescription: Enabling two-factor authentication requires entering an authentication code in addition to your password when logging in. You'll need an authenticator app like Google Authenticator or Authy.
security.changePasswordDescription: Protect your account security by changing your password regularly.
security.allSessionsRevoked: All other sessions have been revoked
security.revokeOtherDevices: Log out from all other devices (Recommended)
security.revokeOtherDevicesDesc: For enhanced security, this will revoke sessions on other devices. This device will remain logged in.
security.passwordMustBeDifferent: New password must be different from current password

passkey.setupDescription: Passkeys allow you to sign in securely without a password using Face ID, Touch ID, or your device PIN.
passkey.description: Passkeys allow you to sign in securely without entering a password.
passkey.name: Passkey Name
passkey.notSupported: Your browser does not support passkeys.

mutes.mutedUsersDescription: Posts from muted users will be hidden. The user won't be notified.
mutes.wordMutesDescription: Hide posts containing specified keywords. Regular expressions are supported.

licenses.title: License Information
